foods.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
foods.description: A healthy grilled chicken salad with fresh greens and a light vinaigrette.

foods.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
foods.description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

foods.title: Beef Tacos
foods.description: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

foods.title: Margherita Pizza
foods.description: A classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

foods.title: Teriyaki Salmon Bowl
foods.description: Grilled salmon with teriyaki sauce served over steamed rice and vegetables.

foods.title: Chicken Alfredo
foods.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with tender chicken over fettuccine pasta.

foods.title: Vegetarian Burger
foods.description: A delicious veggie patty served with lettuce, tomato, and avocado.

foods.title: Seafood Paella
foods.description: A traditional Spanish dish with rice, shrimp, mussels, and squid.

foods.title: BBQ Ribs
foods.description: Juicy pork ribs slow-cooked and smothered in BBQ sauce.

foods.title: Thai Green Curry
foods.description: Spicy green curry with chicken, coconut milk, and fresh vegetables.

foods.title: Sushi Platter
foods.description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls, nigiri, and sashimi.

foods.title: Buffalo Wings
foods.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce with a side of blue cheese dip.

foods.title: Pad Thai
foods.description: A traditional Thai dish of stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and lime.

foods.title: Falafel Wrap
foods.description: Crispy falafel served in a pita wrap with hummus, lettuce, and tahini sauce.

foods.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
foods.description: A rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center served with vanilla ice cream.
